personal_info.name: Utsav Patel
personal_info.title: Associate Staff Engineer / Senior iOS Developer

summary: I am an iOS Developer with over 11 years of experience designing and delivering high-quality iOS and macOS applications across banking, AR, IoT, VoIP, and e-commerce sectors. Strong expertise in Apple UI/UX standards, Swift, Objective-C, MVVM, Protocol-Oriented Programming, RxSwift, Combine, unit testing, and CI/CD. Experienced in leading and contributing to complex projects, building scalable, user-friendly, and efficient applications.
